name: Thing 1, 2, 3, 4 (DIY_ejuice Discord Mixer Showdown 5/26/19)
description:
mixed by: @Edible_Malfunction, @MaxSavage, @Korlimann

The Lorax tried to save the trees. We just want to eat them.

Judges reviews: https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/bt32ip/its_time_for_mixer_showdown_3/

Come join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/ufVTyAQ
author: diy_discord

reviews.text: Excellent work the cactus and vanilla swirl blend in perfectly.
Not really big in to fruits, but this is delicious. The vanilla swirl fits in so flawlessly. Awesome summertime adv. Thank you for this gem.
